name: Larry The Last Zombie
description: Larry is the last zombie left, he is a vegan and enjoys a vegetarian diet, due to health issues, he lives a peaceful life in an abandoned house.Until one day the cyborgs find spots Larry tanning in his yard. Filled with hate they cant see the Larry doesn't want to harm them, and so they try to kill him. Larry is left with no choise but to defend himself with the fruits he grows in his yard.
